page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: {CORNISH FIBRE SPORTS}is a small factory that is in St.Day.The products are all made of fibre glass and plastic.At the moment they are working on the outsides of railway lights for Kenyan Railways and surf skis for the Far East.The surf skis are only a third of what they make.The factory at St.Day is the only one in the County of Cornwall.The longest canoe they make is four metres long.They are making new surf skis which are called Ski Safari.They obtain their material from five different suppliers and the majority comes in big drums.The prices of the surf skis and canoes are: {SURF SKIS=Â£150-Â£225 {CANOES=Â£138-Â£245 In the workforce they have three people working and two bosses.The factory at St.Day used to be an old slaughter house owned by a butcher.
